ygData.subject: Re: Hatar *SPOILER*
ygData.msgSnippet: He also drops a nice piercing weapon Jambiya: Damage 7, Delay 26. Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
ygData.messageBody:
He also drops a nice piercing weapon Jambiya: Damage 7, Delay 26.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti

>From: Darrian Ashoka <dashoka@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Hatar *SPOILER*
>Date: Mon, 13 Sep 1999 08:54:23 -0700 (PDT)
>
>From: Darrian Ashoka <dashoka@...>
>
>
>Hatar is a RARE spawn in Oasis.
>He's about level 23 but of course he hits
>way too hard and often.
>
>I heard he has three drops. I only know of one.
>Fine Silk Turbin.
>For the fashion conscious, this is a great item
>for your Head slot. AC 10 Save vs Fire +10 (I
>think. Elyana can confirm this) and weighs
>almost nothing. Monks love this item too. And
>the best thing (at least for me, a human bard)
>is that it looks like cloth.
>
>
>Darrian Ashoka
>
